AMECard.Name: Key Frame Extraction
AMECard.Definition: Selection of a subset of frames to represent a video segment.

Input.Name: FixedTemporalFrequency
Input.Definition: Number of key frames to be extracted per second.
Input.Comment: If the adaptivity parameter is used, the value may be ignored.

Input.Name: Adaptivity
Input.Definition: A value expressing adaptivity of the extraction to the visual activity in the content. Higher values shall produce more key frames. A value of 0 shall force a fixed key frame rate.

Input.Name: ShotAdaptive
Input.Definition: Take detected shot boundaries into account (i.e., restart detection after boundaries, ensure at least one key frame per shot)

Input.Name: StoreImages
Input.Definition: If true, images of the extracted key frames will be stored.

Input.Name: ImagePath
Input.Definition: Path for storing the extracted key frame images. Ignored of StoreImages is set to false.

Input.Name: ImageHeight
Input.Definition: Height of extracted images in pixels. 0 denotes original size. Ignored of StoreImages is set to false.

Output.Name: DetectedKeyframes
Output.Comment: The output must contain the time points of detected key frames, and may contain the locators of the extracted images.
